resources.string:
Analyzing series of shots, Best Shot chooses the best one, increasing the chances to have a blur free image. Best shot will automatically select the best one and save it.

1. Hold device still and do not move
2. Press shutter to start capture
3. Wait until series of images taken and processed
4. Less blurred image will be selected and saved

Almalence’s new technology makes cameras see like human eye! DRO (Dynamic Range Optimization) uses a technique similar to tone mapping, automatically improves the images in 100% cases and can substitute HDR in most of cases.

1. Press shutter to take picture
2. Wait until processed in a second!
Capture self portrait with front camera. Select desired composition.
Capture self portrait with rear camera.
Hires portrait mode not supported by your device. To use this mode you need device with front and rear cameras.
Sorry, the requested application could not be launched. The barcode contents may be invalid.

1. Hold device still and do not move
2. Press shutter to start
3. Wait until series of images taken and processed

Object removal
Tap detected moving objects to delete

Sequence
Select which photos to use in result

Group shot
Select base image in thumbnails (touch image to see all thumbnails)
Select best faces by touching

Important: Do not move your hand, rotate device only!

1. Hold device still
2. Press shutter to start panorama capture
3. Rotate device to red guides and stop when green.
4. Move camera to next guide
5. To finish panorama - press shutter
A Better Camera v3.52\n(©) by Almalence Inc
Set number of images in capture
Number of images in a burst
Set number of images in capture
RAW capture only works in Single, Burst and Expo-bracketing modes. Also, histogram can not be shown in this mode.
RAW format is DNG. Will work on limited number of devices
Select if preview proportions are incorrect
Enable interface for Sony cameras connection
Skip non secure lock keyguard when device is turned on
Do not use A Better Editor&Effects as default viewer if installed
Use HW shutter to start application
\nNote: some modes have individual setting for image size
Helps if images do not appear in gallery.
In case of manual exposure and long time image on viewfinder and result will differ to avoid slow preview update. Enabling this option you will have real picture on viewfinder, but low fps.
Not guaranteed to work on all models
Camera 2 - Experimental mode. Will work on limited number of devices starting Android 5 and full Camera2 API support
Change if you get all the shots with the same exposure
Try this if the exposure is not changed
Some devices reset focus after capture. Check if you get out-of-focus shots
Separator for data and time, exmpl: 2015-10-30_22:15:45
Save result images to folder of current date
Add location tags. Turn on "GPS location" system setting to get precise geo-tagging
Shutter with fast switching to video mode
Adjust tone mapping parameters after taking a photo
Show number of images that can be shot with current image size setting
Turn on if you want to see the battery status on the screen
Show GPS indicator on the screen
Avoid sleep mode while camera active
Force the screen to maximum brightness
Device camera doesn\'t support \'Fixed Hyperfocal\' focus mode, will use \'Auto focus\' mode
Uncheck this to see original viewfinder.
Some devices reset focus after capture. Check if you get out-of-focus shots.
Amount of images to take per second
Pause after picture taken - for re-focus purposes.
Keep the frames taken in specified period before the wrap.
Select which settings to save between launches
Filenames, formats, geotagging, exif and other parameters
Flash blinks every second of countdown
Activate screens swiping - changing info control on main screen
Activate all features and modes, even future version additions
Take great-looking high-dynamic range images and videos
Remove unwanted objects, combine movement into single photo, select best faces on your photo
Shoot great panoramas with help of augmented-reality
May not work on some devices
Show AE and WB lock controls
Disable buttons sound. Some devices record it in result video.
Enables notification to hold device in landscape orientation
Use standard camera for video recording
Show help when mode started (Panorama, Smart multishot)
Check if device needs more time for exposure change

Important: image resolution will be always set to maximum.

SuperSensor is our all-in-one solution to improve camera with software.
It is a non-material way to put a better camera in your device!

- Superior low-light sensitivity
- 2x resolution increase

Low Light
- Radical noise reduction
- Resolution improvement
- Shadows recovery

HDR
- Due to DR enhancement, high dynamic range scenes are handled well by Super Sensor.
AE/AWB lock only for horizontal panorama
Application can\'t be used until got access to device\'s camera. Camera can\'t be opened.
Not enough memory for capture all RAW frames, will be captured less RAW frames
Not enough memory for capture RAW frames, will be captured only JPEG frames
Sorry, we can\'t put your photos here :(
Sorry, we can\'t create a folder here :(
Low FPS on your device. \n\nHDR Video needs lots of processing resources to make video with acceptable fps rate. Unfortunately not possible on your device. Your fps rate will be:
You can edit your images in our FREE A Better Editor&Effects! Filters, effects and much more!
Application can\'t save geotags until got access to location.
Device supports exposure metering only in center. Exposure point can\'t be moved.
Recorded videos will not contain audio track, if application don\'t have access to microphone.
Connect to compatible camera via Wi-Fi settings before device discovery. Or use NFC connection.
Not enough memory for capture all RAW frames, will be captured less RAW frames or only JPEG frames
Please hold still when taking picture
Sorry, this is maximum frames we can fit in device memory.
Android KitKat does not allow saving to sdcard. Android limitations.
Sony cameras available only in Single and Video modes.
You can take %d frames with this resolution
Allow more frames but may cause a crash due to out of memory
There is no gyroscope on your device, sorry. We instead enable our software gyroscope to enhance your experience
Hardware gyroscope required. If not checked we instead will use our software gyroscope
Processing is not finished yet. Please wait.
Successfully unlocked Panorama and Multishot modes.
If you enjoy using A Better Camera, please take a moment to rate it.\n\nThanks for your support!
We care about your opinion and want to make ABC better. Send your review directly to support.
Application can\'t be used until got access to device\'s storage. Captured images and videos can\'t be saved.

Version 3.25

 New:
 - HDR video (for Android 4.3 and higher)
 - pause for video
 - level tool
 - sweep panorama

 Improved:
 - panorama capture and processing
 - DRO, HDR, Night processing
 - multishots combined in one mode
 - faster processing

 Bug fixes:
 - video fixed
 - stability fixes
You have now the Pro version, thanks to App of the Day
Use premium features FREE for 3 months - subscribe now!
Removing all Settings buttons will make unable to configure current launcher anymore!
To place the launcher on your home screen, choose an \"ABC Launcher Grid/Compact/Full\" from the Widget tab in your list of apps.
To activate launcher you have to install A Better Camera application.
